**Scheme of arrangement between Sterlite Grid 5 Limited ("SGL 5"), our Company and their respective shareholders as sanctioned by the National Company Law Tribunal, Mumbai Bench by way of its order dated September 5, 2024**

Our Company entered into a scheme of arrangement with SGL 5 and their respective shareholders and creditors under sections 230 to 232 read with section 52 of the Companies Act, 2013 which was sanctioned by the National Company Law Tribunal, Mumbai Bench by way of its order dated September 5, 2024 (the "SGL 5 Demerger Scheme"). The SGL 5 Demerger Scheme provided for, amongst other things, the demerger, transfer and vesting of the entire business of SGL5 from our Company as a going concern, including amongst others, all relevant assets, liabilities, contracts, deeds, employees and legal proceedings (the "Demerged Undertaking"). The Form INC-28 for the SGL 5 Demerger Scheme was filed with the RoC on October 8, 2024.
The potential benefits of the demerger, as set out in the SGL 5 Demerger Scheme, included, amongst others:

In accordance with the SGL5 Demerger Scheme, in consideration of the Demerged Undertaking from our Company to SGL5, SGL5 issued 1 equity share of face value of ₹2 each for every one fully paid-up Equity Share of face value of ₹2 each of our Company to eligible members of our Company as on the record date. The equity share entitlement ratio pursuant to the SGL 5 Demerger Scheme was determined based on the valuation report dated September 28, 2023, issued by a registered valuer. Our Promoters are also the promoters of SGL5. Except, Alampallam Ramakrishnan Narayanaswamy who is one of the directors of SGL5, none of our Directors are related to SGL5.

As of the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus, except as disclosed in "- Details regarding material acquisitions or divestments or slump sale of business/undertakings, mergers, amalgamations or any revaluation of assets, in the last 10 years" on page 253 and below, there are no other arrangements or agreements, deeds of assignment, inter-se agreements, any agreements between our Company, our Promoters and/or our Shareholders, agreements of like nature and clauses/ covenants which are material to our Company and which are required to be disclosed, or the non-disclosure of which may have a bearing on the investment decision of prospective investors in the Offer.

Further, as of the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus, except as disclosed below, there are no other clauses/ covenants that are adverse or prejudicial to the interest of the minority and public shareholders of our Company.
